alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Glynn; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Glynn, northeastern Brantley and southeastern Wayne Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 750 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tibet to near Everett to 7 miles northwest of Thalmann. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Everett, Thalmann and Mount Pleasant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
